creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
Fehler: missing ) after argument list
Quelldatei: http://localhost:8080/lenya/lenya/javascript/validation.js
Zeile: 46, Spalte: 50
Quelltext:
		alert("Bitte geben sie einen gültigen Wert für "ID" ein. Gültige Zeichen sind
A-Z, a-z, 0-9 oder -");

because of the different translations the bug doesn't allways take effect. the
problem occours only if there are double quote inside the alert.

creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 15133
replaced double quote with quote in the alert-function so it's possible to use double quote in an alert-string

creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
Comment on attachment 15133
replaced double quote with quote in the alert-function so it's possible to use double quote in an alert-string

the patch is not really good because it's the same problem with quotes in the
i18n catalog

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: i fixed the german translation, which was the only one affected

creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
works for me. but it's still a pitfall. 
maybe we should add a comment in the catalog file?

creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text: *** Bug 34955 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
